verses.text: We love Thy Sabbath, Lord, And worship at Thy will; Oh may these hours sweet peace afford And deeper faith instill.
Thine angels sang for joy Creation's work to see; Oh We too, this day, that all may sanctify our song.
Praise for Thy wondrous love, A sign that sealed this Sabbath day, unify our hearts in praise to Thee; Through Thy sovereignty.
O great Creator King, That through Thy Mount Sinai deem Renew and joy, Through all eternity, Sabbath our song.
And with the white-robed throne, Upon Thy grace be, And raise our hearts to see Thy face, Thy niqay.
